details: Has proven a great anti-psoric and anti-syphilitic remedy. Herpetic eruptions, syphilitic excrescences, glandular tumors and indurations, carcinoma, locomotor ataxia, and obstinate intermittents, and DIABETES are all greatly influenced by this preparation.

Face: ACME ROSACEA, with violet papules on nose; worse in the spring

name: Arsenicum bromatum
dosage: Tincture, two to four drops daily in water. In diabetes, three drops three times a day in a glass of water.
